Package com.vserdiuk.casestudy.controller

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
com.vserdiuk.casestudy.controller.ProductController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/products") public class ProductController extends Object
REST controller for managing Product-related operations.

This controller provides endpoints for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving Products. It supports both single and batch operations for product management, as well as paginated retrieval of products. All endpoints are prefixed with "/api/products".

    • createProduct

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProductDTO> createProduct(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CreateProductDTO dto)
      Creates a new product based on the provided data.
      Parameters:
      dto - the data transfer object containing the details required to create a product
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the created ProductDTO with HTTP status 201 (Created)

    • createProducts

      @PostMapping("/batch") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ProductDTO>> createProducts(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid List<CreateProductDTO> dtos)
      Creates multiple products in a single batch operation.
      Parameters:
      dtos - a list of data transfer objects containing the details for creating multiple products
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of created ProductDTO objects with HTTP status 201 (Created)

    • updateProduct

      Updates an existing product with the provided data.
      Parameters:
      dto - the data transfer object containing the updated product information
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated ProductDTO with HTTP status 200 (OK)

    • updateProducts

      @PutMapping("/batch") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ProductDTO>> updateProducts(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid List<UpdateProductDTO> dtos)
      Updates multiple existing products in a single batch operation.
      Parameters:
      dtos - a list of data transfer objects containing the updated information for multiple products
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of updated ProductDTO objects with HTTP status 200 (OK)

    • deleteProduct

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteProduct(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with HTTP status 204 (No Content) indicating successful deletion

    • deleteProducts

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteProducts(@RequestBody List<Long> ids)
      Deletes multiple products by their IDs in a single batch operation.
      Parameters:
      ids - a list of product IDs to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with HTTP status 204 (No Content) indicating successful deletion
